legal_rules.law_text: Under the The Vice-Presidents Pension Act, 1997 (VicePresidentAct), referring to Section 1, Section 2, Section 2(1A), Section 2(2), Section 3(a), Section 3(b), Section 3(c), Section 4.
Under the The Vice-President’s Pension (Amendment) Act, 2008 (VPPA Amendment Act, 2008), referring to Section 6.
Under the Central Act (NA), referring to Section not specified.
